series: NATO science for peace and security series
title: Sustainable use and development of watersheds
subjects: Water resources development -- Environmental aspects -- Congresses
by_statement: edited by I. Ethem Gönenç ... [et al.].

notes.value:
Described as proceedings.

"This book is based on a NATO-sponsored SPS (NFA) 5th Workshop on "Sustainable Use and Develoment of Watersheds for Human Security and Peace", held in Kumburgaz, Istanbul, Turkey, 22-26 October 2007"--p. vii.

Includes bibliographical references.
